lines.text: A woman... she'd be beautiful if her flesh wasn't decaying.
Not the Hall of Death again! The only way out of here is death!
It's her - the Keeper of the Scrolls! I feel like I should bow, but I'm too embarrassed.
I don't think Ik and Uk are going to molest me anymore.
A neon cactus. How charming. This fruitcake is probably in to country music too.
For a Dark World being, she is absolutely beautiful... stunning.
